sentences.sContent: Tick the description that best fits you.
sentences.sCn: 给最符合你的描述打钩。

sentences.sContent: Just tick the box on your order form.
sentences.sCn: 就在你订单的方框内打钩。

phrases.pCn: [口语]一会儿，一刹那间，一转眼间

words.tran: 滴答响的东西；自动收报机；钟表；断续器
坚质条纹棉布或亚麻布；（指钟表发出的）滴答响声

trans.tranOther: to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc
